review: Very choppy streaming. Fire stick would freeze numerous times. I noticed this especially with Hulu. My 5 year old Roku streams smoothly and almost never freezes. I sent the Fire stick back and am using my Roku again. Very disappointing.
author: Rebecca L. Mundy

review: LOVE my fire stick, a great way to watch prime video, netflix, and listen to music on my TV. Also love that there's a phone app remote because my only complaint is that the remote is small and black and gets lost often with kids in the house. My son can use the fire stick for games instead of my phone which is great as well.  I also like that I can upload my pictures from my phone into the amazon cloud and view them on the TV via the fire stick.
